DOC.brief_summary: To investigate safety efficacy long-term combination therapy rabeprazole low-dose aspirin .
DOC.brief_title: Rabeprazole Specific Clinical Experience Investigation Long-term Combination Therapy With Low-dose Aspirin
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Patients take longterm lowdose aspirin prevention thrombus/embolism start administration rabeprazole ( include patient start lowdose aspirin day start administration rabeprazole ) . 2 . Patients history gastric/duodenal ulcer . 3 . Patients require longterm use rabeprazole prevention recurrence gastric/duodenal ulcer induce lowdose aspirin . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Patients gastric/duodenal ulcer start administration rabeprazole . 2 . Patients active upper gastrointestinal bleed start administration rabeprazole . 3 . Patients contraindication rabeprazole .
